apps.name: BetterBatteryStats
apps.description: Analyse the behavior of your phone, find applications causing the phone to drain battery while it is supposed to be asleep and measure the effect of corrective actions: spot drainers based on detailed information about the root cause, detect changes in the awake/sleep profile and quickly find the causes (rogue apps).

apps.name: CPU Info
apps.description: Provides main information about hardware and software of your device: CPU and GPU specification, RAM and storage state, display metrics, sensors data and much more.
